Suggested readings relevant to the workshop

Daru, B.H. & Rock, B.M. (2023) Reorganization of seagrass communities in a changing climate. Nature Plants 9: 1034–1043.

Gumbs, R., Chaudhary, A., Daru, B.H., Faith, D.P., Forest, F., Gray, C.L., Kowalska, A., Lee, W.S., Pellens, R., Pollock, L.J., Rosindell, J., Scherson, R.A. & Owen, N.R. (2023) Indicators to monitor the status of the Tree of Life. Conservation Biology

Daru, B.H. & Rodriguez, J. (2023) Mass production of unvouchered records fails to represent global biodiversity patterns. Nature Ecology & Evolution 7: 816–831.
